皻字的基本解释

皻
zhā
古同“齇”。

皻
cǔ
皮肤粗糙皲裂。

皻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhā］
［《廣韻》側加切，平麻，莊。］
亦作“皶1”。
(1)痤疮。
(2)鼻部及其两侧所生的红色小疮粒。

皻字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【皮字部】　皻； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页792第03
【廣韻】側加切【集韻】莊加切，?音渣。【類篇】鼻上皰。【黃帝素問】勞汗當風寒，薄爲皻。【註】俗謂之粉刺。　又【正字通】紅暈似瘡，浮起。著面鼻者，曰酒皻。　又【五音集韻】采古切，音蔖。【博雅】皸皵，皻也。　【玉篇】今作齇。【類篇】通作?。俗作皶。

皻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
皻字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
皻
zhā
Ancient Tong "齇".
皻
cǔ
Rough and chapped skin.
皻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhā］
["Guangyun" side cut, plain hemp, Zhuang. ]
Also known as "皶1".
(1) Acne.
(2) Small red sores on the nose and its sides.
皻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Noon Concentration] [Pier Character Department] 　皻; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 792 03
[Guang Yun] Side add cut [Ji Yun] Zhuang add cut, sound slag. 【Classes】Blisters on the nose. [Huang Di Su Wen] When the wind is cold, it is thin and thin. [Note] Commonly known as acne.　[Zhengzitong] Blush like sores, floating. Those who have the face and nose, said Jiujiu.　[Five Tone Collection Rhyme] picking ancient cuts, sound 蔖. 【Bo Ya】Jianguo, Yanye.　【Jade articles】This is made of jade. 【Classes】Common for?. Vulgar as a chariot.
